Title: Increases Rockland county's annual minimum allocation through the MTA Dutchess-Orange-Rockland Fund (DORF)
Summary: Increases Rockland county's annual minimum allocation through the MTA Dutchess-Orange-Rockland Fund (DORF) from two million dollars to ten million dollars.
LawCode: Amd ยง1270-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to Rockland county and the metropolitan transportation authority special assistance fund
